name: Project Life Bound
description:
This is the first alpha demo for Project Life Bound. This is more of a proof of concept rather than a fully-featured demo. There is no UI to guide you so just play around with things to figure it all out.

**NOTE** There WILL be bugs. Please, if you run in to any, please notify me if you have time!

Controls: 

WASD  to move

Mouse to aim & click to shoot

Space bar to jump

E to interact

LSHIFT to melee

To toggle use of controller press 1 on the keyboard

L joystick to move

R trigger to aim, release to fire

A to jump 

X to melee

Y to interact
